column3: AITA for getting high so my relatives don't try and pawn their children on me?
AITA for leaving my husband at home, while I spend the week at my brothers, because of how he “buys” groceries?
AITA for “kidnapping” my baby, causing my husband to have a panic attack
AITA for telling a pregnant woman to sit on the ground instead of giving her my seat?
AITA for putting out my neighbours fire with my garden hose while we’re on a fire ban?
AITA for making my brother-in-law pay for his son's meal after I said it was my treat?
AITA for embarrassing my father by offering to stop telling my children that I love them.
AITA for telling my sister nothing she ever does is more important my wife’s school?
AITA for answering a rude question with a rude question?
AITA for being upset with the clothes my granddaughter wore on her way out of the maternity ward?
